search.query: | mstats latest(_value) as value where index="telegraf" metric_name=disk.used OR metric_name=disk.total `devices_exclusions` host=$host$ by metric_name, path | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(disk.used) as disk.used, first(disk.total) as disk.total by path | eval pct_used=round((('disk.used' / 'disk.total') * 100),2), "disk.total"=round(((('disk.total' / 1024) / 1024) / 1024),2), "disk.used"=round(((('disk.used' / 1024) / 1024) / 1024),2) | rename disk.used as "disk used (GB)", disk.total as "disk total (GB)", pct_used as "disk used (%)" | sort 0 device
